snippet.title: Students evacuated after possible bomb threat at private Melbourne boys school
snippet.content: Hundreds of students have been evacuated from Scotch College in Melbourne after a possible bomb threat. Authorities were called to the prestigious Hawthorn school on Morrison Street about 1.30pm. Students have been evacuated from the college onto the oval. 9NEWS has contacted authorities for more information on the threat. More to come. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
